Title: The Collector
Writer: John Fowles (novel), John Kohn (screenplay), Stanley Mann (screenplay)
Actors: Terence Stamp, Samantha Eggar, Mona Washbourne, Maurice Dallimore
Plot: Freddie, a socially withdrawn bank clerk and butterfly collector, decides to expand to collecting human specimens. That's where art student Miranda Grey comes in. Miranda matches wits with Freddie the icy psychopath.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 7 nominations.
